Articles.Content: So I want to make a transfer to Jool, and on my way I want to make a maneuver node at the ascending node to get my Jool inclination at 0.0 degrees.  However I plot my course to Jool and instead of the ascending node being on my course to Jool it changes to the course after I fly by Jool (on my orbit after Jool encounter). Any way I can change this?
